Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
com.xml.editor.SearchController
public class SearchController extends Object
Controller for handling search-related actions and theme toggling in the XML editor.

This class provides methods to perform word and topic searches in the editor's text area and toggle between light and dark themes. The theme toggle also updates associated images.

    Field

    javafx.scene.image.ImageView

  • Method Details

    • wordpress

      public void wordpress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches for the given word in the draft text and displays the results in the output.

      This method is triggered when the user clicks the "Wordpress" button. It clears the previous search results and displays the new ones found by calling the Functions.wordSearch(String[], String) method with the draft's text and the search word.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the "Wordpress" button click.

    • topicPress

      public void topicPress(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches for the given topic in the draft text and displays the results in the output.

      This method is triggered when the user clicks the "Topic" button. It clears the previous search results and displays the new ones found by calling the Functions.topicSearch(String[], String) method with the draft's text and the search topic.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the "Topic" button click.

    • toggleTheme

      public void toggleTheme(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Toggles the theme between light and dark modes.

      This method updates the stylesheet of the scene, changes the theme toggle icon, and switches the application logo image based on the current theme state.

      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the theme toggle button.
